snippet: Microsoft Corp's board faces a lawsuit over the way it handled an error with its Internet Explorer browser that ended up costing the company a record-breaking $731 million fine by European antitrust regulators....

headline.print_headline: Microsoft Sued Over Browser Miscue That Led to $731 Million EU Fine
headline.main: Microsoft Sued Over Browser Miscue That Led to $731 Million EU Fine

lead_paragraph: Microsoft Corp's board faces a lawsuit over the way it handled an error with its Internet Explorer browser that ended up costing the company a record-breaking $731 million fine by European antitrust regulators.
